info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Schenectady and central Saratoga Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Galway, or 10 miles east of Amsterdam, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Glenville, Ballston Spa, Round Lake, Galway, North Ballston Spa, Rock City Falls, Kings, Wilton, Malta, Greenfield, Charlton, Parkis Mills, Deans Corners, Shaw Corners, Hoffmans, Kings Station, Barkersville, West Milton and Garrison Manor. People attending Saratoga Race Course (Horses), Saratoga County Fair, and Saratoga Performing Arts Center (SPAC) should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes Interstate 87 between exits 11 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
